item.title: VSCode Find and Replace Using `regex`
item.description: This morning I needed to do some bulk “find and replace” operations in most of my Rootstalk content. My first thought was to write and run a little Python script, but then I wondered what VSCode might bring to the table. Plenty, it brought plenty! To keep this post as brief as possible, I’m simply going to reference an instructional video that I created earlier: VSCode-Find-and-Replace.mp4.
